price: Akyinnyeε biara nni ho sε Daakye no wͻne berεguofoͻ paa no.
arabic: لَا جَرَمَ أَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلۡأَخۡسَرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: lā jarama annahum fī al-ākhirati humu al-akhsarūna
